about_the_game:
Halloween 2 Book

This Halloween themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The creepy, the kooky, the mysterious and the spooky.

Contents

The Halloween 2 book unlocks the following images:
  • Vampire - 44x98
  • Magic Cat - 48x48
  • Bats - 50x41
  • Zombie - 53x72
  • Skull - 57x58
  • Witch - 58x76
  • Ghost - 75x83
  • Frankenstein - 75x100
  • Cute Pumpkins- 77x52
  • Witches Hat - 92x65
  • Werewolf 93x79
  • Black Cat - 98x98
  • Spiderweb 100x100
  • Wolf - 112x111
  • Scared Girl - 120x120
  • Graveyard - 158x42
  • Dark Pumpkin - 176x144
  • Cave - 200x113
  • Haunted House - 200x113
  • House on the Hill - 338x185

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Halloween 2 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: Unlocks the second Halloween themed book for Coloring Pixels! Includes 20 new Halloween pixel art pages to complete. Get in the Halloween spirit...If you dare!
